snippet.title: Valis III (Genesis) Playthrough - NintendoComplete
snippet.description:
A playthrough of Renovation's 1991 Sega Genesis platformer, Valis III. 

It's largely the same game as the TurboGrafx CD version, but with a new stage (granted, it replaces the many stages that were cut in this version), the obviously different sound (though the Genesis version sounds awesome (unless compared to the CD's rockin' 80s synth vibe), missing cinemas, and it seems a few more layers of parallax than the Turbo's (even though the Turbo did an amazing job at faking, especially when compared to games like Ys III and Ninja Gaiden!).  

Valis III is not my favorite game of the series (that honor would go to the remake of the first on the Super CD2), but the Genny's rendition is nonetheless a good port of a fantastic platformer. 

I've had these recordings of the Valis games sitting on my hard drive for about a year according to the time stamp. I just stumbled onto them and realized I'd never uploaded them, so here you go!
_______
No cheats were used during the recording of this video. 

NintendoComplete (http://www.nintendocomplete.com/) punches you in the face with in-depth reviews, screenshot archives, and music from classic 8-bit NES games!

Visit for the latest updates!
